definition: custom-made/made-to-order/to have something custom made/also written 定製|定制
to agree/to conclude/to draw up/to subscribe to (a newspaper etc)/to order

sentences.english: All of BNI's traditions are tailored to support this mission.
sentences.chinese: 所有BNI的傳統都是訂製來支持這個使命的。

sentences.english: Did you order a suit from the store?
sentences.chinese: 你曾向這家店訂製西服嗎？

sentences.english: Can be customized according to customer demand for non-standard equipment.
sentences.chinese: 並可根據用戶的要求訂製特殊規格的產品。

sentences.english: Can be installed or custom built non-return valve function of the valve.
sentences.chinese: 可安裝止回閥或訂製自帶止回功能的閥。

sentences.english: Our netsuke can be produced from your sample, or created with your ideas in minimal quantities.
sentences.chinese: 我們能以樣品製作掛墜，也能按創意以最小訂單訂製。

sentences.english: A custom half-circle window was installed in the breakfast nook.
sentences.chinese: 一個訂製的半圓窗安裝在早餐區的角落。

sentences.english: The children unpacks food and drinks, piling catered delicacy over a stone tablecloth.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們把訂製的食物和飲料都堆在石桌布上。

sentences.english: Division X has developed a new product that requires a custom-made fitting.
sentences.chinese: 部門已發展出一種新產品，其需用一個訂製的配件。

sentences.english: The company custom-tailored a Western suit made of polyester wool for each employee.
sentences.chinese: 公司爲每個員工訂製了一套毛滌料子的西服。

sentences.english: All the custom-made wood furniture in the study room go hand-in-hand.
sentences.chinese: 訂製的木傢俱，是表現書香的靈魂。

sentences.english: We will order achievement badges and attachments according to this list.
sentences.chinese: 我們將依此名單訂製會員成就徽章及附件。

sentences.english: He paid double for the customized car. (adv.
sentences.chinese: 他付雙倍的價錢購買訂製的車輛。

sentences.english: It takes at least half a year from the time you order your plane to delivery.
sentences.chinese: 從你訂製你的飛機到交付至少要半年的時間。

sentences.english: The Club Leadership Plan can be customized to fit the needs of each Rotary club around the world.
sentences.chinese: 扶輪社領導計畫能依全世界扶輪社的需要來訂製。

sentences.english: He looks distinguished in his custom-made suit.
sentences.chinese: 他穿上訂製的西服顯得氣度不凡。

sentences.english: The division has developed a new product that requires a custom-made fitting.
sentences.chinese: 該部門已開發出一種新產品，其需用一個訂製的配件。

definition: to belong or be dedicated exclusively to/proprietary/private/personal
to set up/to arrange/to lay out
to choose for some purpose/to select and use
to arrange/to set out/to decorate/to display/decorative items
unique and unmatched (idiom); unrivalled/nothing compares with it
outfit or suit (of clothes)/set of coordinated items/kit
